title: USB Vista Emergency Repair Disk
description:
USB Vista Emergency Repair Disk

Do you have a Vista PC or Laptop that will not boot? Blue screen of death or code errors? Endless reboots going nowhere? Vista requires you boot into the OS to fix the OS. If the Vista PC or laptop cannot boot you are stuck. New laptops and PC's typically do not come with installation media. Without this you must format and re-install, losing everything on the hard drive.

Run the Windows Vista Recovery Disc from a USB RAM Key instead of having to burn it onto a CD. Good for situations where you don't want to waste a CD or when you do not have a working CD-ROM. This also lets you repair a system without having the Vista installation media!

Uses freeware software and easy step-by-step instructions. Lets you boot into Vista Recovery and Rescue utilities when you cannot boot Vista on a PC or laptop.

Resulting USB Key will boot up in NT / Vista or DOS.

Size: 122 MB

Requires at least a 128MB USB RAM Key (V1.0, V1.1, V2.0)
